originalText.text: Bought a $300 leather jacket. The first time wore it after going home. It got torn in two pieces. The lady was very rude. I think that lady has a behavioral issues with the customers

text.text: Bought a $300 leather jacket. The first time wore it after going home. It got torn in two pieces. The lady was very rude. I think that lady has a behavioral issues with the customers

originalText.text: My wife and I took an afternoon to shop and eat around one of our favorite neighborhoods when we came across Variazioni.  We rediscovered the healing joy of splurging on a new dress. My wife found something that she will look beautiful in on the beach or meeting friends for drinks downtown.  The woman who works at the shop is proud of her collection and prepared to step up and help us celebrate again.  If you have been locked in your apartment for the past 2 years, I highly recommend you walk into this shop

originalText.text: Wonderful shop!!! I wish Mona Lisa had a shop in Denver this is now a must stop for future business trips! Love the Italian style and prices are very reasonable. Quality is impeccable. Will definitely be returning.

text.text: Wonderful shop!!! I wish Mona Lisa had a shop in Denver this is now a must stop for future business trips! Love the Italian style and prices are very reasonable. Quality is impeccable. Will definitely be returning.

originalText.text:
I just walked into this store and was in there for maybe a minute and walked out as I felt SO uncomfortable. As soon as I walked in, a woman walked up to me and asked me to leave my umbrella at the door. I complied right away. She could have started with “Hello”and/or “Welcome”.l but chose to be rude and unprofessional.
Then, she proceeded to watch my every move like I was in there to steal. I decided to just leave. Were you following me because of the color of my skin? I do not think a person who owns a multimillion dollar place in TriBeCa needs to come into your measly store to steal. You ought to be ashamed of yourself.

originalText.text: It states on the door and online that the location closes at 8pm. I tried to enter the store at 7:40 and the person at the register literally shooed me away. It’s disappointing and unfortunate because I wanted to try on a dress in the window  for a wedding taking place the following day. I have been in retail for 8 years and you never turn a customer away before actual closing hours.
